resources.string: Failing to locating, try to switch off airplane mode or turn on wifi.
Invalid base station info, make sure that a SIM card is installed.
Permission is required to locating, change it in your settings.
Internet connection exception, check your network settings.
GPS module does not work correctly, more satellites needed.
Failing to locating, no SIM card is detected and wifi is turned off. Please turn on your wifi or install a SIM card.
Authentication failed for access to AMap api.
Amap failed to locate your position.
Failed to get an available network connection.
Location might be emulated by other apps.
Locating service is not launched correctly, please double check your manifest file.
Unknown error occurred, please record your operation and report it to your manager.
Failed to locate your position, please record your operation and report it to your manager.
